Html: When zoomed the map , the black tiles occured. Is that possible to resize the old tiles before the new tiles are downloaded compeletely? like googlemap , when zoom in it , the old tiles will be  expanded,and then they  are replaced by new tiles in the same position  tile by tile.

yes it's know isue http://gmap4dotnet.codeplex.com/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=52279

any ideas on realisation? ;}
